cause.description:
Alan has now been freed unharmed. Thank you everyone for your support.
1. Alan Johnston must be freed unharmed - for the sake of the people of Gaza
2. The Hama's led government should not use force to free Alan, negotiation is the only safe way to secure his release
cause.mission: Bring attention to the plight of kidnapped BBC Gaza Correspondent Alan Johnston
cause.name: Free Alan Johnston
